alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Fayette; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Hays; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 6:07AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Caldwell, south central Hays, northeastern Guadalupe, south central Bastrop, northeastern Gonzales, southwestern Fayette and northwestern Lavaca Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 607 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Luling, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, San Marcos, Seguin, Lockhart, Luling, Flatonia, Moulton, Martindale, Waelder, Kingsbury, Staples, Fentress, Cistern, Palmeto State Park, Geronimo, Zorn, Muldoon, Brownsboro, Delhi, and Joliet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bastrop; Caldwell; Fayette; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Hays; Lavaca
